author: Willy
content: So when Niagra Falls had been diverted for repairs? Why didnt the Park Service remove the vessel to some where on land then?

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: A well built scow to last all this time without rusting to pieces. Nothing built nowadays would last that long.

author: Phil
content:
Glad you caught it on the news.
Now what?
(Will they turn off the falls, again like they did in the past) to remove the iron junk, or wait to see if it goes over?

News mentioned keeping tourist away, away from what? Seeing something never happening before?

Idiot governments and police!
